card.name: Earth Tanto
card.description: An earth-elemental short sword that hits the tile in front of you.

card.name: Earth Wakizashi
card.description: An earth-elemental medium sword that hits the tile in front of you.

card.name: Earth Katana
card.description: An earth-elemental standard sword that hits the tile in front of you.

card.name: Curved Earth Blade
card.description: An earth-elemental sword that hits the tile in front of you and the tile below.

card.name: Wide Earth Sword
card.description: A, earth-elemental sword that hits the tile in front of you and the tiles above and below.

card.name: Earth Naginata
card.description: A, earth-elemental spear that hits 2 tiles in front of you.

card.name: Earthened Kanobo
card.description: A studded, earth-elemental mace that hits hard and stuns the enemy in front of you.

card.name: Earthened Hammer Slam
card.description: Slams and stuns the enemy in front of you.

card.name: Earthened Hammer Swing
card.description: Slams and stuns the enemies in the tile in front of you and the tiles above and below..

card.name: Single Earth Kunai
card.description: Throws an earth-elemental kunai in front of you.

card.name: Double Earth Kunai
card.description: Throws an earth-elemental kunai in the row front and below you.

card.name: Triple Earth Kunai
card.description: Throws an earth-elemental kunai in all three rows.

card.name: Single Earth Shuriken
card.description: Throws an earth-elemental shuriken in front of you.

card.name: Double Earth Shuriken
card.description: Throws an earth-elemental shuriken in the row front and below you.

card.name: Triple Earth Shuriken
card.description: Throws an earth-elemental shuriken in all the rows.

card.name: Single Earth Sai
card.description: Throws an earth-elemental sai dagger in front of you.

card.name: Double Earth Sai
card.description: Throws an earth-elemental sai dagger in the row front and below you.

card.name: Triple Earth Sai
card.description: Throws an earth-elemental sai dagger in all the rows.

card.name: Earth Naginata Throw
card.description: An earth-elemental spear thrown at the tiles in front of you, piercing the first enemy and stopping at the second.

card.name: Earth Throw
card.description: Throws a piercing rock chunk in front of you.

card.name: Earth Swing
card.description: Throws two piercing rock chunks in the row front and below you.

card.name: Earth Barrage
card.description: Throws piercing rock chunks downs all the rows.

card.name: Tremor
card.description: The earth swells two tiles in front of you and destroys the third tile.

card.name: Blazing Tanto

card.name: Burning Wakizashi

card.name: Flaming Wide Sword
card.description: A fire-element sword that hits the tile in front of you and the tiles above and below.

card.name: Searing Naginata
card.description: A fire-element spear that hits 2 tiles in front of you.

card.name: Enkindled Kanobo
card.description: A studded, fire-element mace that hits hard and stuns the enemy in front of you.

card.name: Double Fire Kunai

card.name: Triple Fire Kunai

card.name: Triple Fire Sai

card.name: Searing Naginata Throw
card.description: A fire-element spear thrown at the tiles in front of you, piercing the first enemy and stopping at the second.

card.name: Ignite Tile
card.description: Ignites the tile in front of you, damaging enemies that step on it.

card.name: Cone of Flames
card.description: Ignites the tiles in cone-fashion, damaging enemies that step on them.

card.name: Line of Fire
card.description: Ignites a line of three tiles, damaging enemies that step on them.

card.name: Fireball
card.description: A fireball that scorches an enemy in front of you.

card.name: Blazing Fireball
card.description: A fireball that scorches through 2 enemies.

card.name: Scorching Fireball
card.description: A fireball that scorches through 3 enemies.

card.description: A studded mace that hits hard and stuns the enemy in front of you.

card.description: A fan that hits the tile in front of you and the tiles above and below.

card.description: Slams and stuns the enemies in the tile in front of you and the tiles above and below..

card.name: Bouncing Shuriken
card.description: A special shuriken that bounces in a zig-zag pattern.

card.name: Double Lightning Bolt
card.description: 2 random lightning strikes on the enemy field.

card.description: 3 random lightning strikes on the enemy field.

card.name: Lightning Strike
card.description: A strike of lightning two spaces ahead.

card.name: Lightning Cross
card.description: A cross-shaped barrage of lightning.

card.name: Lightning X
card.description: An X-shaped barrage of lightning.

card.name: Lightning Shot
card.description: Channels your chi into a charged, thunderous bolt that strikes straight across the field.

card.name: Regular Heal
card.description: A basic Health restore.

card.name: Greater Heal
card.description: A medium Health restore.

card.name: Ultra Heal
card.description: A large Health restore.

card.name: Regular Shield
card.description: A magic shield that protects from 1 hit.

card.name: Super Shield
card.description: A magic shield that protects from 2 hits.

card.name: Ultra Shield
card.description: A magic shield that protects from 3 hits.

card.name: Panel Grab
card.description: Steals a nearby enemy panel.

card.name: Line Grab
card.description: Steals the closest line of enemy panels.
